titleStmt.title: An epistle containing a salutation to all faithful friends, a reproof to the unfaithful, and a visitation to the enquiring in a solemn farewell to them all in the land of my nativity.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
